sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9be0bac31b451c50f34064e6ec4bcbdf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_laso_systrack_bl.RunSensorAction</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script for running sensor actions.</description><name>RunSensorAction</name><script><![CDATA[var RunSensorAction = Class.create();
RunSensorAction.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	runAction: function() {
		try
			{
				gs.info('runaction');
				var sysTrackMaster = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.systrack_master", "");
				var midServer = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.mid_server", "");
				var cloudUsername = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.cloud_username", "");
				var cloudPassword = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.cloud_password", "");
				var cloudClientIdentifier = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.cloud_tenant_identifier", "");
				var sysTrackInstall = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.install_type", "");
				var basicauthusername = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.basic_auth_username");
				var basicauthpassword = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.basic_auth_password");
				var basicauth = "Basic " + gs.base64Encode(basicauthusername + ":" + basicauthpassword);
				var http = gs.getProperty("x_laso_systrack_bl.http_protocol");
				var azureROPCTokenEndpoint = "https://systrackcegl.b2clogin.com/systrackcegl.onmicrosoft.com/b2c_1_ropc_auth/oauth2/v2.0/token";
				var bearerBody = 'grant_type=password&scope=openid ' + cloudClientIdentifier + ' offline_access&client_id=' + cloudClientIdentifier + '&response_type=token&username=' + cloudUsername + '&password=' + cloudPassword;
				var cookieUri = http + "://" + sysTrackMaster + "/CloudAssessmentService/api/cookie";
				var cookie;
				var accessToken;
				
				var systemfqdn = this.getParameter('sysparam_systemfqdn');
				var actionnumber = this.getParameter('sysparam_actionnumber');
				
				var guidRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				var endpoint = http + "://" + sysTrackMaster + "/api/systems?$filter=fqdn%20eq%20%27" + encodeURIComponent(systemfqdn) + "%27";
				guidRequest.setEndpoint(endpoint);
				guidRequest.setHttpMethod("get");
				
				if (sysTrackInstall === "cloud") {
					var bearerRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
					bearerRequest.setEndpoint(azureROPCTokenEndpoint);
					bearerRequest.setHttpMethod("post");
					bearerRequest.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
					bearerRequest.setRequestBody(bearerBody);

					var bearerResponse = bearerRequest.execute();
					accessToken = JSON.parse(bearerResponse.getBody()).access_token;

					var cookieRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
					cookieRequest.setEndpoint(cookieUri);
					cookieRequest.setHttpMethod("get");
					cookieRequest.setRequestHeader('Host',sysTrackMaster);
					cookieRequest.setRequestHeader('Authorization','Bearer ' + accessToken);

					var cookieResponse = cookieRequest.execute();
					var cookieHeaders = cookieResponse.getAllHeaders();

					for(var i in cookieHeaders){
						if(cookieHeaders[i].name == 'Set-Cookie' && cookieHeaders[i].value.startsWith('currentAssessment')){
							cookie = cookieHeaders[i].value;
						}
					}

					guidRequest.setRequestHeader('Host',sysTrackMaster);
					guidRequest.setRequestHeader('Authorization','Bearer ' + accessToken);
					guidRequest.setRequestHeader('Cookie',cookie);
				}
				
				if (sysTrackInstall === "on-premises") {
					guidRequest.setMIDServer(midServer);
					guidRequest.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', 'true');
					guidRequest.setRequestHeader("authorization", basicauth);
				}
				
				var guidResponse = guidRequest.execute();
				var systemguid = JSON.parse(guidresponse.getBody());
				systemguid = systemguid.data[0]['guid'];
				gs.info(systemguid);
				
				var sensorActionRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				endpoint = http + "://" + sysTrackMaster + "/api/serviceNow/definedSensorActions";
				sensorActionRequest.setEndpoint(endpoint);
				sensorActionRequest.setHttpMethod("get");
				
				if (sysTrackInstall === "on-premises") {
					sensorActionRequest.setMIDServer(midServer);
					sensorActionRequest.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', 'true');
					sensorActionRequest.setRequestHeader("authorization", basicauth);
				}
				else if (sysTrackInstall === "cloud") {
					sensorActionRequest.setRequestHeader('Host',sysTrackMaster);
					sensorActionRequest.setRequestHeader('Authorization','Bearer ' + accessToken);
					sensorActionRequest.setRequestHeader("Cookie", cookie);
				}
				
				var sensorActionResponse = sensorActionRequest.execute();
				
				var actionlist = sensorActionResponse.substring(1, sensorActionResponse.length - 1).split(',');
				
				var actionRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				endpoint = http + "://" + sysTrackMaster + "/api/sensoractions/run";
				actionRequest.setEndpoint(endpoint);
				actionRequest.setHttpMethod("post");
				
				if (sysTrackInstall === "on-premises") {
					actionRequest.setMIDServer(midServer);
					actionRequest.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', 'true');
					actionRequest.setRequestHeader("authorization", basicauth);
				}
				else if (sysTrackInstall === "cloud") {
					actionRequest.setRequestHeader('Host',sysTrackMaster);
					actionRequest.setRequestHeader('Authorization','Bearer ' + accessToken);
					actionRequest.setRequestHeader("Cookie", cookie);
				}
				
				var sensorBody = '{"systems": ["' + systemguid + '"],"executePackages": [{"profileId": "' + actionlist[actionnumber] + '","actionToTake": 0,"parameters": {}}]}';
				gs.info(sensorBody);
				
				actionRequest.setRequestBody(sensorBody);
				
				//var sensorResponse = sensorRequest.execute();
			}
		catch(ex)
			{
				gs.error("Exception occurred while making Lakeside SysTrack REST call for Incident '{0}': {1}", current.number, ex.toString());
			}
	},
	
    type: 'RunSensorAction'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Garrett.Boren</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-01 20:52:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9be0bac31b451c50f34064e6ec4bcbdf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RunSensorAction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SysTrack Root Cause Analysis" source="x_laso_systrack_bl">c493d3590f76d20039da8d8ce1050edb</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SysTrack Root Cause Analysis">c493d3590f76d20039da8d8ce1050edb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9be0bac31b451c50f34064e6ec4bcbdf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Garrett.Boren</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-08 12:16:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
